issue.title: Wrong ogre library loaded at runtime when Ogre1.x and Ogre2.x are both installed

content.raw:
I believe it's because of this issue that `ogre2` is not listed as one of the `RENDER_ENGINE_VALUES` [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/6ed27e29a6e03d749c93a44b3f50f415e6be6c3e/test/test_config.h.in#lines-12), is that right?

I think this means no tests are being run for `ogre2` at all? If that's the case, I'd suggest:

1. Changing `ogre` to `ogre2` on that list, so we test the main engine we're focusing on.
1. Splitting the tests into separate executables, so that we can test both ogre 1 and 2.
content.html:
I believe it's because of this issue that ogre2 is not listed as one of the RENDER_ENGINE_VALUES here, is that right?

I think this means no tests are being run for ogre2 at all? If that's the case, I'd suggest:

  1. Changing ogre to ogre2 on that list, so we test the main engine we're focusing on.
  2. Splitting the tests into separate executables, so that we can test both ogre 1 and 2.
